details: Consolidated 3 workforce databases into a single concise source using Snowflake and Python
Cleaned and optimized Snowflake tables with Python, streamlinig data analysis for non-technical users
Developed an internal Python web app consuming Collibra's APIs to help departments easily find and understand data sources and their technical lineage
Integrated Okta authentication to an internal customer support application using TypeScript and Vue allowing users to log in securely with their Okta accounts
Developed a Python package to standardize AWS configurations making it easier to set up AWS on any machine, new or old
Created an in-app new-user guide using Swift to make learning how to use the app simpler

Created a complete web application using TypeScript, React, and TailwindCSS on the front and Elixir on the back to allow farmers to manage and create product storage locations without intervention from HQ
Validated frontend with Cypress tests and backend with Elixir unit tests to ensure that the UI and backend functions worked correctly
Volunteered at farms performing tasks such as moving vegetable trays, hand-harvesting, labeling produce clamshells, and preparing product boxes for delivery

work.position: Computer Science & Mathematics Department Peer Mentor
details: Advised 5-10 students every week on how to start their technical careers
Collaborated with fellow mentors to create academic and professional guidelines for over 100 students providing a structured framework for students to excel in their pursuits
Created and shared a resource document containing technical tutorials, guides, and information about job openings
Co-created a React component for clients to upload batch utility data (gas, water, electric) using AntD Icons, TailwindCSS, and FlatFile, providing a user-friendly tool for utility data management
Supported a colleague in learning the technologies above which sped up project progress
Worked in an agile scrum setting, gaining exposure to real-world software development practices
